Package org.trianacode.taskgraph.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CableListener
    An interface implemented by classes that want to receive cable events.
    NodeListener
    An interface implemented by classes that want to receive node events.
    TaskGraphListener
    An interface implemented by classes that want to receive taskgraph events.
    TaskGraphManagerListener
    A listener interface implemented by classes interested in receiving taskgraph manager events, such as notification when a new taskgraph is created.
    TaskListener
    An interface implemented by classes that want to receive task events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CableEvent
    The event generated when a cable is disconnected, reconnected etc.
    ControlTaskStateEvent
    The event generated when the control task is connected/disconnected/unstable
    NodeEvent
    The event generated when a node is disconnected, reconnected etc.
    ParameterUpdateEvent
    The event generated when a parameter is updated
    TaskDisposedEvent
    The event generated before a task is disposed.
    TaskGraphCableEvent
    The event generated when a cable is connected/disconnected within a taskgraph
    TaskGraphCreatedEvent
    The event that is generated when a new taskgraph is created by the TaskGraphManager
    TaskGraphTaskEvent
    The event generated when a task is created/removed from a taskgraph
    TaskNodeEvent
    The event generated when a node is added or removed from a task
    TaskPropertyEvent
    The event generated when a property of a task is updates (e.g.
